attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: dont break our green belt what would the country by like if it were high tower blocks and people everywhere you went? this is the reality of the future if our green belt is broken you build on one part then on a next until theres nothing left!! stop ruining the country and build on old abondoned sites. i would rather have the english countryside than more immigrants for which we have to spoil our country to accomodate them.
